programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: SC
programme.desc: The best and worst from the world of sports.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: NFL Monday Night Countdown
programme.desc: An in-depth look at Monday's game and reviews of Sunday's games.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Bulldogs host the Longhorns. Last season, Georgia beat Texas 30-15 in the regular season, and then 22-19 in overtime in the SEC title game. Texas held off then-No. 9 Vanderbilt for its fourth straight win Nov. 1. Georgia has won five in a row.

programme.title: Grey Cup Revisited
programme.desc: A look back at past Grey Cup games.

programme.title: CFL Playoffs in 30
programme.desc: Shortened replays of CFL Playoffs games.

programme.title: CFL Playoffs in 30
programme.desc: Shortened replays of CFL Playoffs games.

programme.title: CFL Playoffs in 30
programme.desc: Shortened replays of CFL Playoffs games.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Tiger-Cats seek a hat trick against the Alouettes in the East final. Hamilton won both dates versus Montreal this season, snapping a nine-game slide against the Als that included two playoff losses. Montreal beat Winnipeg 42-33 in the semifinal.

programme.title: CFL Playoffs in 30
programme.desc: Shortened replays of CFL Playoffs games.

programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Roughriders face the Lions in the West final. Sean Whyte's field goal as time expired got BC past Calgary 33-30 in the semifinal. Saskatchewan seeks its first Grey Cup berth since 2013, while BC aims for its first trip since hosting in 2011.

programme.title: Live: NFL Countdown
programme.desc: Highlights from previous week's action in the National Football League.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Vikings (4-5) try to complete a fourth season-series sweep of the NFC North rival Bears (6-3) in the last five years. Minnesota prevailed 27-24 in Week 1. The Bears have won six of their last seven games following a 24-20 triumph over the Giants.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Seahawks host the Rams. The NFC West foes are 7-2 after winning four in a row, with Los Angeles outscoring opponents 128-46 and Seattle 129-67 in those runs. DeMarcus Lawrence had two defensive TDs in Seattle's 44-22 romp over Arizona on Nov 9.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Eagles host the Lions for a potential NFC championship game preview. Jahmyr Gibbs totaled 172 yards from scrimmage and three TDs in Detroit's 44-22 victory over Washington. Philadelphia has won three in a row after beating Green Bay on Nov. 10.

programme.title: Live: SC With Jay Onrait
programme.desc: The latest scores and highlights, with host Jay Onrait.

programme.title: 2025 Grey Cup
programme.desc: The Alouettes and Roughriders duel in the 112th Grey Cup. Both teams needed semifinal heroics, with Tommy Nield's touchdown catch with 12 seconds left getting Saskatchewan by BC 24-21, while Montreal upset Hamilton 19-16 on a last-second field goal.

programme.title: Breaking Down Barriers
programme.desc: First Assist, founded by former NHL player John Chabot, aims to help Indigenous students succeed in school by using sports as a motivational tool to boost attendance, classroom engagement and promote healthy life habits.

programme.title: Breaking Down Barriers
programme.desc: Highlighting the Ottawa Rapid FC, while also showcasing the Active Newcomer Youth Ottawa's Let Girls Play Mobile Clinic and its partnership with the team to inspire young girls through soccer.

programme.desc: No. 8 Gotham FC continue their run into the NWSL semifinals against No. 4 Orlando. Gotham played giant-killer in the quarterfinals, ending the historic campaign of Kansas City with a 2-1 extra-time victory. Orlando took down Seattle 2-0 to advance.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mouch and Ritter work together to solve a murder mystery; Severide and Cruz tackle a food truck fire; Gallo goes to see Hawkins about Violet.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The big wedding day arrives and Firehouse 51 welcomes Casey back to celebrate the joyous occasion; Emma's plans to replace Violet come to a shocking end.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kidd and Severide's honeymoon is interrupted by a dangerous person from their past; Kidd's former academy classmate joins Firehouse 51; Brett and Violet reflect on their relationships.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman claims that the baby she kidnapped is hers with a respected legal expert, the investigation changes the lives of two families.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro's by-the-book handling of a starlet's arrest gets him back on the SVU squad in time to investigate the actress's latest offense, statutory rape.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: After Chicago chaos in the ring, Braun swaps slams for dogs, edible balloons and astonishing bites.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi opens a police investigation when his niece reports a classmate for sexual assault; Stone learns there are no perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for an abducted woman and her young daughter leads Lt. Benson to cross paths with an old friend; Stone must make a tough decision on behalf of his sister.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An Alzheimer's patient claims she was raped, but her illness casts doubt on the case; Fin's sergeant orders come in.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint; Benson makes an attempt to defuse the situation; the team discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncover a dangerous criminal network prepared to silence anyone who gets in its way.

programme.desc: If necessary, the top two U.S. wheelchair mixed doubles teams face off in the third and final game at the U.S. Olympic Trials.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A construction tycoon interferes with an SVU investigation into her family; Carisi struggles to get an indictment when the complainant backs down.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi must tread carefully when Maxwell's husband becomes a person of interest in an SVU investigation; Benson sends Velasco to take an old friend into custody.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson tries to help a student after she's assaulted on a field trip; Fin suspects a witness in the case may not be telling the whole truth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the squad celebrates the birth of Rollins and Carisi's child, another child goes missing in broad daylight.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi opens a police investigation when his niece reports a classmate for sexual assault; Stone learns there are no perfect witnesses when it comes to sex crimes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl's tragic death becomes a criminal case when a surgeon harvests her organs without parental consent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Benson goes into hiding to find justice for an abused housewife (Clea Duvall), uncovering a 34-year-old unsolved murder case in the process.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Sonya Paxton (Christine Lahti) tries to help an old friend (Debra Messing) who starts receiving personal threats.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Rollins investigate when a mental patient says he witnessed a rape, but the alleged victim denies the assault happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape of an actress during a theater production.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The already frantic search for a missing diabetic boy becomes more urgent when he is spotted with a couple known for child endangerment and pornography.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro must face the consequence of his reckless behavior; when an online ad for escorts leads to the rape and robbery of tourists, Benson discovers she has a connection to one of the suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team tries to find a bike messenger -- who has kept a video diary of his troubles with women -- before he can commit another violent act; the new deputy chief calls Benson's leadership into question.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Sgt. Voight and Detectives Lindsay and Halstead work with Sgt. Benson and the SVU as they investigate the roots of a child pornography site; tension between Benson and Voight threaten the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman wants to recant her testimony and free her father, who was incarcerated for incest and rape when she was a child; Capt. Cragen, who remembers the original investigation, tries to help the team.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Efforts to find an 8-year-old boy kidnapped for ransom are hindered by tension between the child's estranged parents; Sgt. Benson is asked to take the lieutenant's exam and officially become the leader of the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Johnny D (Charles Halford) is on trial for sex trafficking, rape, assault and kidnapping, Noah's adoption becomes involved with the case, causing Benson to fear for the child's future; a threat could permanently change the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The cops get tangled in an elaborate online hoax that leads to the rape of a popular social media star; Benson sets new ground rules with Sheila.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Emotions run high as the squad embarks on a frantic search for Benson's missing son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A doctor arrested for sexually abusing his patients is set free after Cassidy's testimony causes a mistrial.
